full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN GYI SRUNG MA GTUM DRAG CAN RNAMS KYI GSOL MCHOD MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN GYI SRUNG MA GTUM DRAG CAN RNAMS KYI GSOL MCHOD MDOR BSDUS 'DI NI, RGYAL PO CHEN PO DE NYID KYI TSA BO'I BRGYUD DU BYUNG BA PHU BO AER TE NI NO YON MKHAN PO DAR KHAN PHYAG MDZOD BLO BZANG SBYIN PAS BSKUL MDZAD PA LTAR, MNGA' BDAG GI RIGS LAS RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO ,MANGGALAm BHA WANTU,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
